page.title: 03BARR GALA
page.content: On the third Saturday in June, Barr Community Association holds the annual Barr Gala Day in the grounds of the old manse(Barskaig House).The Gala begins at the local primary school where the pipe band, followed by the Gala Queen's procession, makes it's way along the main street past the two hotels to the end of the village and into the Old Manse field.in recent years the Queen's carriage has been a veteran Morris Cowley car.The Queen,chosen by her primary school friends,and her two ladies in waiting,mount the dais where the crowing ceremony takes place,last year's Queen performing the crowning.After the Queen's speech the races begin with events for all ages ranging from five-a-side soccer to tug-o-war.At night the Queen presides over a Ceilidh in the village hall.
